IT, COMMUNICATIONS abbreviation for Integrated Services Digital Network: a system for sending sound, video and other data at high speed using telephone wires: Teleconferencing via ISDN is cheaper than flying executives around the world for monthly meetings. If you need three ISDNs, you should consider investing in a satellite linkup.
